AppPage.FooterText: Voicipher is your professional assistant that converts voice to text using Google AI Technology. Convert your audio record to text or use a real time dictation. Simple, accurate and reliable.

HomePage.BannerText2: Increase your productivity. Convert audio to text easy and fast.
HomePage.BannerText3: Let Voicipher do it for you.
HomePage.Text2: Audio and real speech to text
HomePage.Text3: Upload your file or use a real time dictation on your phone. Choose the language and receive a transcript of your audio.
HomePage.Text7: English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Slovak, Czech, Russian, Hungarian and more.
HomePage.Text8: Check if your language is available
HomePage.Text10: Make any in-text changes and download a ready-to use document. Navigate in text better thanks to timestamps.
HomePage.Text11: Access your data via phone or computer
HomePage.Text12: Upload a file via phone and edit it on a computer. Or vice versa.
HomePage.Text18: download in docx or send to email
HomePage.Text22: Start on computer or download our app on any mobile device!

AboutPage.Headline: Who is Voicipher?
AboutPage.Text1: Hi friend, I'm Voicipher! Some friends call me “ici”.
AboutPage.Text2: I'm your professional assistant who will help you transcribe all your voice memos to text. Or even do a real time dictation for you.
AboutPage.Text3: I know, you may ask why should you believe a bot. But trust me. I'm a professional. And I use Google AI Technology and Azure to secure high quality for you.
AboutPage.Text4: If I had to describe myself in three words? I'm simple, accurate and reliable.

PricingPage.Headline: Pricing
PricingPage.Text1: No Subscription, Just Buy as Much Time as You Need
PricingPage.Text2: Purchase additional time anytime you need. A 5 minutes long audio will consume 5 minutes from your time credit.

PrivacyPage.Headline: Privacy policy
PrivacyPage.Text1: Your privacy is important to us. It is Voicipher's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website,
PrivacyPage.Text3: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used:
PrivacyPage.Text5: The sole purpose of storing your login account association is to provide you the access to previously transcribed document on a new device.
PrivacyPage.Text8:
User data
The sole purpose of collecting user data is to improve the product and enhance our users' experience.
PrivacyPage.Text11: Voicipher uses third party applications which are getting basic data (email, name and surname,...), or uploaded files only in order to provide you with our services. Our website may also link to external sites that are not operated by us.
PrivacyPage.Text12: Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites and this part applications, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.
PrivacyPage.Text14: Voicipher uses third-party and App Center crash reporting to gather usage data and technical problems information. Voicipher collects and stores certain information about your visit to help us to better align our mobile and web app design with your needs. The information Voicipher and these third-party services collect includes:
PrivacyPage.Text15: The operating system of your device
PrivacyPage.Text17: This information is only used to improve the product and enhance our users’ experience.
PrivacyPage.Text19: All uploaded files requested for transcription are sent to Google Cloud Speech-to-text. Real speech transcription requests are sent to Microsoft Azure Speech Recognition. Both provide strong security measures to protect your files. You can read more about their practices here:
PrivacyPage.Text23: We don't collect any payment information such as credit card information, card holder's name, etc. All payments are operated by Google Play or Apple Store. What we only collect is basic information like invoice numbers or date of transaction.
PrivacyPage.Text25: All of our services run in the cloud. We don’t host or run our own routers, load balancers, DNS servers, or physical servers. Our service is built on Azure Web Services, Google Cloud Platform and Smarter ASP.Net. They provide strong security measures to protect our infrastructure and are compliant with most certifications. You can read more about their practices here:
PrivacyPage.Text29: How do we protect your information?
PrivacyPage.Text30: We take the security of your personal information very seriously. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
PrivacyPage.Text31: However, we cannot ensure or warrant the security of any information you transmit to Voicipher or guarantee that your information on the Voicipher may not be accessed, disclosed, altered or destroyed by breach of any of our industry standard physical, technical or managerial safeguards. When you enter your data we encrypt that information using secure socket layer technology (SSL). No method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure, however. Therefore, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
PrivacyPage.Text32: However, we don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law or in order to provide you with our services.
PrivacyPage.Text33: We take the following specific steps to protect your information:
PrivacyPage.Text34: Use internal access controls so only limited personnel have access to your information.
PrivacyPage.Text35: All information is secured through modern security technologies like secure socket layer (SSL), firewalls, and secure passwords.
PrivacyPage.Text37: We are compliant to the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). The purpose of GDPR is to protect the private information of EU citizens and give them more control over their personal data.
PrivacyPage.Text38: How long do we keep your data?
PrivacyPage.Text39: We only retain collected personal information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service.
PrivacyPage.Text40: You can do the following at any time by contacting us via the email address:
PrivacyPage.Text41: Ask for a list of personal information we have about you, if any.
PrivacyPage.Text42: Request a change, correction, or deletion of your personal information.
PrivacyPage.Text43: Request that we avoid collecting anything in the future (opt-out) , with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services.
PrivacyPage.Text44: You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services.
PrivacyPage.Text46: By using voicipher.com I declare that I have been informed of the processing of my personal data and my rights and I agree to receive newsletters to my email address.
PrivacyPage.Text48: Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us on support@voicipher.com.
PrivacyPage.Text49: All changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. When we change the policy, we will let you know via email.
PrivacyPage.Text50: This policy is effective as of 1 March 2020.
